editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Four Gospels F-12v: Introduction to the Four Gospels. F-16r: Eusebian Canon Tables. F: Table of Contents for the Gospel of Matthew. F: on the Resurrection. F-72r: Gospel of Matthew. F: Introduction to the Gospel of Mark. : Table of Contents to the Gospel of Mark. F-105r: The Gospel of Mark. : Introduction to the Gospel of Luke. F-166r: The Gospel of Luke. The text of the gospels includes the canon numbers in the margins as well as indications of quotations from the Old Testament. F-167r: Introduction to the Gospel of John. F: Table of Contents for the Gospel of John. F-215r: The Gospel of John. Notes: f. i r and v v: On the importance of fasting. Ff. ii r-iv r: Excerpt from Book of the Wise, መጽሐፈ፡ ጠቢባን፡, a collection of wisdom sayings. includes a mention of the owner, ዘጊዮርጊስ. : Record of the sale of the downstairs of a house by አቤቶ አሞኔዎስ to ወዘሮ ወለተ ገብርኤል who sold it to አቤቶ ዮሐንስ. A huge list of witnesses is included. The names and the use of the language indicate an origin in Tigre.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
